name: Art Scrambles
description:
"If you like jigsaw puzzles you'll love Art Scrambles!"

Discover beautiful masterpieces as you swap puzzles pieces to reveal the paintings.

Bangkok Post: "This app is an undiscovered gem..."

• Includes 11 beautiful paintings with 600 more available
• Over 100 artists
• Orchestral sounds created by a classically-trained composer
• Use Assistant to help with hard-to-place pieces
• Use Peek for sneak-peeks beneath the pieces
• Progress is stored for each puzzle so pause one and start another
• Replay puzzles in different piece shapes and sizes

Included in Sampler collection:
Leonardo da Vinci
Vincent Van Gogh
Hans Holbein the Younger
Utagawa Hiroshige
Edgar Degas
Gustav Klimt
Franz Hals
Ilya Repin
Hieronymus Bosch
Pieter Brueghel the Elder
Jean-Baptiste Camille Corot
James McNeill Whistler
